content: dress… stitch together front and back panels leaving plenty of space for the sleeves add a row of single_crochet stitches to the inside of the sleeve if desired to make stitching them together easier stitch the sleeves to the armhole if you have a space at the neckline between granny stitches and no chain 3 to stitch along then add a chain 3 to get to the next stitch stitching the single_crochet edge row to the scooped neckline oh… look what you made me do if you enjoyed this pattern then you will love this use the below code to get $1 off any pattern by the end of august 2024 code swiftie thank you so much for downloading this pattern i had to make this dress a reality the moment i saw it due to the immense desire to have the pattern done asap i did not perform the usual pattern test please contact me at fleetingobsessions@gmail com if there are errors or if you have any questions this pattern was an inspiration from the dress seen online and is not to be considered an official pattern stay crafty krista mccloud fleeting obsessions art
